actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the expansion of the Board of Veterans' Appeals and the designation of certain individuals to act as members of the Board, and for other purposes.
short_title: Board of Veterans Appeals Act of 1983

summary.text: Board of Veterans' Appeals Act of 1983 - Increases the maximum number of the Board of Veterans Appeals from 50 to 65. Permits the Chairman to designate a member. Limits such designees to one per section of the Board.

titles.title: Board of Veterans Appeals Act of 1983

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the expansion of the Board of Veterans' Appeals and the designation of certain individuals to act as members of the Board, and for other purposes.
